_header: To them that loves Thee in cleanness
_description: The Fifteen Ooes — 326 lines in couplets

BLAru285.First Lines: To þame þat luffis þe in cleynnesThy Ioy passis all Ioying ti…
BLAru285.Last Lines: …Out of þis warld in Lestand blisThow steid it quhair þi sanctis is
BLAru285.Note: Followed by verse rubric: “Quhen ȝe haue said þir omnis to ane end / Than say þis orisoun till a commend” (f. 93).
